title: Sheet Pan Lemon Herb Chicken and Roasted Vegetables
description: Easy cleanup, hearty flavors with bone-in, skin-on chicken, broccoli, and bell peppers.

For the Chicken.item: bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs and/or drumsticks

For the Chicken.notes: Italian seasoning, herbs de Provence, etc.

Preparation.text: Preheat oven to 400째F (200째C). Line a large, rimmed baking sheet.

Prep Vegetables.text: In a large bowl, toss broccoli, bell peppers, and garlic with 3 tbsp olive oil, half the dried herbs, paprika (if using), salt, and pepper.
Spread vegetables in a single layer on the baking sheet, leaving space for chicken.

Prep Chicken.text: Place chicken in the same bowl. Drizzle with 1 tbsp olive oil, juice of half lemon, remaining herbs, salt, and pepper. Toss to coat.

Arrange and Roast.text: Nestle chicken pieces among vegetables on baking sheet, skin-side up.
Place lemon wedges around the pan.
Roast for 40-50 minutes, until chicken is cooked through (165째F/74째C), skin is crispy, and vegetables are tender.
Can toss vegetables halfway through. Tent with foil if browning too quickly.

Rest & Serve.text: Let chicken rest for 5-10 minutes before serving.
Garnish with fresh parsley, if desired.
Serve chicken and vegetables, squeezing roasted lemon wedges over top.

notes: Patting chicken dry helps skin crisp.
Ensure pan is not overcrowded; use two if needed.
storage: Store leftovers in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 3 days.
Reheat in the oven or air fryer to maintain crispness.
